
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_53527913">
分享一个10秒自动结束进程的bat<br>
不支持空格中文字符的文件夹<br>
之前用zTasker 总是会卡一下鼠标。<br>
在管理工具里面导入计划任务，开机运行。<br>
https://pan.baidu.com/s/1LIo2nqIWAtYYW4prcCIzTA?pwd=a3yi 提取码: a3yi<br>
<br>
<font color="#3f3f3f"><font style="background-color:rgb(208, 242, 195)"><font face="Arial, 微软雅黑, 宋体, 新宋体, sans-serif">https://wwuw.lanzoub.com/b01390hnpa</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#3f3f3f"><font style="background-color:rgb(208, 242, 195)"><font face="Arial, 微软雅黑, 宋体, 新宋体, sans-serif">密码:4x3v</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#3f3f3f"><font style="background-color:rgb(208, 242, 195)"><font face="Arial, 微软雅黑, 宋体, 新宋体, sans-serif"><br>
</font></font></font>https://www.123912.com/s/gZp9jv-DF7d3<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">@echo off

:loop

tasklist /fi "imagename eq sesvr.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im sesvr.exe
)

tasklist /fi "imagename eq sesvcr.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im sesvcr.exe
)

tasklist /fi "imagename eq sesvc.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im sesvc.exe
)

tasklist /fi "imagename eq SeAppService.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im SeAppService.exe
)

tasklist /fi "imagename eq 360bdoctor.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im 360bdoctor.exe
)

tasklist /fi "imagename eq MultiTip.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im MultiTip.exe
)

tasklist /fi "imagename eq webapp.exe" &gt; nul
if %errorlevel% equ 0 (
  taskkill /f /im webapp.exe
)




timeout /t 10
goto loop</pre></div><br>
<br>
<div style="padding:15px 0;"><div style="font-size:12px;">[Asm] <em class="viewsource" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">纯文本查看</em> <em class="copycode" style="cursor:pointer;font-size:12px;color:#369 !important;">复制代码</em></div><pre class="brush: asm; gutter: true">set ws=createobject("wscript.shell")

rem 新建一个脚本对象

ws.run "D:\ProgramData\Shut\Shut_down.bat",0

rem 执行rar.bat文件，后面的0代表运行该bat文件时不显示dos窗口</pre></div><br>
